name: Entertainer's Pack
description: A performer's kit containing essential supplies for traveling entertainers and artists. Unpacking equips a backpack and places all contents inside it.
notes: Contains: Backpack, Bedroll, Bell, Bullseye Lantern, Costume Clothes (2), Steel Mirror, Oil (8 flasks), Rations (9 days), Tinderbox, Waterskin
Must not be wearing a backpack to unpack
Unpacking equips backpack and places contents inside
Single use item - consumed when unpacked
